page.title: 19Population in N/Ham/Coll P
page.content: The North Hammersmith and College Park is a densely populated area. Most people came to the area originally for employment,either on the railway,or at the prison or hospital or to the local industrial areas. The White City Estate with the buiding of the television centre. The Old Oak Estate and Wormholt Estate grew with the prison. On these estates many of the families are second and sometimes third generation. There are a few immigrant families living there, mainly due to the work on the railway,or in the local shops. The east the area is particularly densely populated, with a variety of nationalities. These include Irish,West Indian, Indian, Pakistan,Italian,Spanish, Chinese,Malay and Moroccan.Many of these families have moved recently to England and are settling in London
